General.Name: Shenzhen Hymson Laser Intelligent Equipments Co Ltd
General.Description: Hymson Laser Technology Group Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells lasers and automation equipment in China and internationally. The company provides lithium battery automation, wind-cooled UV laser equipment, large scale automated production line, large scale laser cutting equipment, and PCB labeling systems, as well as precision laser cutting and welding equipment. It serves 3C, medical, electricity, and semiconductor industries. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
